channel.title: 'javac' error
channel.description:
Hello, When i changed something in [b]Client.jave[/b] ( the welcome massage ) and i click save. and i click on [b]compile.bat[/b]it says : 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
i press a key and it just goes away and helps nothing How i can fix this ?
soz i placed this 2 times

item.title: 'javac' error
item.dc:creator: @rickoez rickoez
item.description:
@rickoez wrote:

now i get this :
the system can’t find the right path. or something

soz for my bad english,

Read full topic

item.title: 'javac' error
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

change it to

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: 'javac' error
item.dc:creator: @rickoez rickoez
item.description:
@rickoez wrote:

this opens when i click edit

@echo off

javac -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -classpath . *.java -g

pause

Btw, i got 12

Read full topic

item.title: 'javac' error
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

Right click your compile and click edit, change the jdk version from 06 or 07 to 12, thats the most recent.

If it is already download the latest version of JDK.

Read full topic
